<https://wjschne.github.io/ggdiagram/>

`{ggdiagram}`

```{r}
speaker_data |> 
  mutate(
    F1 = log(F1),
    F2 = log(F2)
  ) |> 
  summarise(
    .by = speaker, 
    poly = density_polygons(F1, F2, probs = 0.8, as_list = T)
  ) |> 
  unnest(poly) |> 
  rowwise()  |> 
  mutate(
    points = ob_point(F2, F1) |> list()
  ) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  summarise(
    .by = speaker,
    poly = ob_polygon(bind(points)) |> list()
  )->
  jawn
```
